Name: Absinthe Cooler
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Top up with Thomas Henry Ginger Ale
Instructions: SHAKE first 5 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with ginger ale.
Review: The basil is subdued, as is the elderflower with absinthe being the predominant flavour – although not domineeringly so.
